programme.title: John Wick
programme.desc: New York City becomes the bullet-riddled playground of a former assassin (Keanu Reeves) as he hunts down the Russian mobsters who destroyed everything he held dear.

programme.title: John Wick: Chapter 2
programme.desc: Legendary hit man John Wick comes out of retirement when a former associate plots to seize control of an international assassins' guild. Bound by a blood oath to help him, Wick travels to Rome to square off against the world's deadliest killers.

programme.title: John Wick
programme.desc: New York City becomes the bullet-riddled playground of a former assassin (Keanu Reeves) as he hunts down the Russian mobsters who destroyed everything he held dear.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An abused foster child (Jae Head), apprehended while driving a runaway van, leads the detectives to re-examine a case involving a rape victim (Sara Gilbert).

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A teen named Eric admits to looking at a Web site in an attempt to curb pedophilic urges toward his stepbrother; when Eric goes missing, the stepfather (Tom Noonan) is questioned.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When the body of a 14-year-old girl is found in the Hudson River, Benson and Stabler think she was smuggled into the country by sex traffickers; in an attempt to identify her, Benson poses as a madam.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Serial arsonist on the loose leaves no evidence.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A man becomes the prime suspect in his wife's death after forensic science raises questions about her apparent suicide.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The team investigates the murder of a federal prison inmate who was the adopted daughter of a notorious counterfeiter; Callen is summoned by the ATF Internal Affairs board to discuss Anna Kolcheck's actions.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Sam is shot during a firefight with the cartel; an interrogated suspect reveals new information on the whereabouts of Spencer Williams, the man who kidnapped Mosley's son.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Despite several team members having reservations, the team travels to Mexico to locate and rescue Mosley's son.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler begin to question the story of a missing teenager (Ellen Woglom) who returns home after four years, claiming to have been kept as a sex slave in a concrete cell.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A man is found badly beaten in a parking lot, with no memory of what happened, and detectives suspect his transgender teen may be responsible.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A mute girl is raped and beaten, and her drawing of her attacker resembles a local priest.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An artist's shocking death leads detectives to uncover a long string of murders by an elusive serial killer.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a 2-year-old girl goes missing, her irresponsible young mother (Hilary Duff) becomes the prime suspect.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Officer Nate Kendall (Wentworth Miller) helps a woman in trouble and gets roped into investigating a rape; when evidence connects multiple cases, the team realizes there may be a serial rapist responsible.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler and Benson suspect a sugar daddy (Matt C. Burns) of murder when a young woman's body is found stuffed inside a suitcase.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a woman goes missing, her boyfriend points Detectives Benson and Stabler in the direction of convicted bank robber Callum Donovan (Stephen Rea); to comprehend the impact of solitary confinement, Stabler experiences it.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives Benson and Stabler investigate when a 10-year-old girl goes missing.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives try to identify a girl who is so traumatized after being raped that she cannot tell them her name.

programme.title: John Wick: Chapter 2
programme.desc: Legendary hit man John Wick comes out of retirement when a former associate plots to seize control of an international assassins' guild. Bound by a blood oath to help him, Wick travels to Rome to square off against the world's deadliest killers.

programme.title: John Wick: Chapter 3 -- Parabellum
programme.desc: Stripped of the High Table's protective services, legendary hit man John Wick must fight his way through the streets of New York as the world's most ruthless killers try to collect the $14 million bounty on his head.

programme.title: The Rainmaker
programme.desc: Featuring a special preview of USA's new series, The Rainmaker.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: With lives hanging in the balance, Harry is put to the test.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler begin to question the story of a missing teenager (Ellen Woglom) who returns home after four years, claiming to have been kept as a sex slave in a concrete cell.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A man is found badly beaten in a parking lot, with no memory of what happened, and detectives suspect his transgender teen may be responsible.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A mute girl is raped and beaten, and her drawing of her attacker resembles a local priest.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An artist's shocking death leads detectives to uncover a long string of murders by an elusive serial killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Investigators on both sides of the Atlantic seek links between three homicides that look like professional executions.
Athena and Bobby set off on their honeymoon cruise, but when duty calls, their vacation is put on hold; a fighter jet traps a civilian; an unusual incident leaves a couple stuck together.

The disastrous cruise continues when Bobby and Athena respond to the ship's explosion, racing to aid injured passengers; Hen questions her instincts in a life-taking call and grows concerned about Athena and Bobby's whereabouts.

With each moment becoming critical as the ship flips upside down, Athena and Bobby take charge, seeking methods for rescue while navigating efforts to guide survivors to safety; Hen defies protocols in her search for Bobby and Athena.

Upon her return to shore, Athena's son finds himself in trouble with the law; Buck grows envious as Eddie forms a close bond with someone else; the team rescues a woman who's stuck on receiving a rose at an iconic mansion.

Hen and Karen welcome a new addition to their family; a call unfolds involving a person's limb that's taken on a mind of its own; Eddie and Marisol take a closer look at their relationship; Buck navigates his new feelings.

After years of anticipation, Maddie and Chimney's long-awaited wedding day arrives; when the groom mysteriously vanishes, the 118 races against time to ensure he doesn't miss the most crucial day of his life.
Maddie and Athena investigate a case surrounding an abducted mother and child; Hen and Karen learn more about Mara's family history; Eddie grapples with unresolved feelings for someone from his past.

After a victim of the apartment fire that changed Bobby's life resurfaces, he searches to make amends; driven by his need to right past wrongs, Bobby delves deep into memories of his childhood, unearthing moments from his fractured past.

programme.title: John Wick: Chapter 3 -- Parabellum
programme.desc: Stripped of the High Table's protective services, legendary hit man John Wick must fight his way through the streets of New York as the world's most ruthless killers try to collect the $14 million bounty on his head.

programme.title: Violent Night
programme.desc: An elite team of mercenaries breaks into a family compound on Christmas Eve, taking everyone hostage inside. However, they aren't prepared for a surprise combatant: Santa Claus is on the grounds, and he's about to show why this Nick is no saint.

programme.title: Live: WWE Friday Night SmackDown
programme.desc: The Superstars of World Wrestling Entertainment display their skills and athleticism in weekly episodic programming, as scores are settled and enduring rivalries play out in the ring.

programme.desc: Action from the UEFA Champions League as Feyenoord face Bayern Munich at De Kuip. Bayern are unbeaten in their last eight UCL games against Dutch opponents.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Football
programme.desc: Manchester City fight for their place in the UEFA Champions League as they face Club Brugge at Etihad Stadium. Only a win will be enough for City to qualify for the play-off round.

programme.title: IWL Wrestball 3x3
programme.desc: The explosive fusion of basketball, rugby, and wrestling -- where agility, power, and strategy collide. Be the first to experience this new-rules-arena revolution.

programme.title: 2025 Golden Tee Golf World Championships
programme.desc: The world's best Golden Tee players converge at the Palms Casino Resort in Las Vegas to battle for nearly $200,000 in prizes. The stakes are high, the legends are ready -- who will take home the title in the game that helped shape esports?

programme.title: Mailboat Jumping
programme.desc: Carriers compete to secure a spot on the historic Mailboat Team, jumping from boat to dock and back again while in motion. It's part timing, part chaos,and a century-old tradition that defines summer. Don't fall in-or do, but don't expect sympathy.

programme.title: 2025 National Bubble Gum Blowing Championship
programme.desc: Finalists chew. They blow. They pray it doesn't pop too soon. The biggest unburst bubble wins. One gum blower will be crowned the 2025 Champion. The rest go home sticky and defeated.

programme.title: The Goodyear Blimp Sky Race of the Century
programme.desc: To mark the 100th anniversary of the Goodyear Blimp in 2025, Goodyear brought all three of its U.S. airships to Akron, Ohio for the Sky Race of the Century. While blimps aren't known for speed, this race has no shortage of action.

programme.title: Pop-A-Shot 2025 National Championship
programme.desc: The Pop-A-Shot 2025 National Championship brings together the top qualifiers from across the country. A head-to-head, tournament-style competition and the thrilling finale of the Pop-A-Shot National Series.

programme.title: Diving Chess: Duel in the Depths
programme.desc: Two champions face off in a high-stakes underwater chess match -- where every move is made on a single breath.

programme.title: 2025 Blackbird Cup - Alberta Pro Roller Hockey League
programme.desc: The championship game of the Alberta ProRoller Hockey League (APRHL), highlighting Canada's emerging inline hockey talent, community roots, and diverse player stories.

programme.title: Microsoft Excel World Championship 2024 Finals
programme.desc: Microsoft Excel World Championship is an Excel Esports competition where players solve unusual game tasks in Microsoft Excel. For the second year, the Finals were held at the HyperXArena Las Vegas, uniting top players from around the globe.

programme.title: The 2025 Big Boy Soap Hockey Tournament
programme.desc: The biggest and baddest soap hockey league in the world faces off in an eight-team, single elimination tournament to win the ultimate prize... the Golden Duck.

programme.title: Donk Toss World Championship
programme.desc: The Donk Toss World Championships is a glorious backyard sport that blends skill, chaos, and comedy. Players toss an inflatable donkey and score points by landing it in funny positions -- on its feet, ears-down, snout-first, or even upside down.

programme.title: 2025 T-Rex World Championship Races
programme.desc: It's a race of prehistoric proportion as men, women, children and seniors compete to be the 2025 T-Rex World Champion!

programme.title: Slippery Stairs at The Ocho
programme.desc: Competitors attempt to reach the top of the slippery stairs.

programme.title: Bike Polo
programme.desc: The mastery of polo meets the intensity of biking. Watch as this innovative sport takes to the streets of Brooklyn New York, with City bragging rights on the line.

programme.title: 2025 World Dog Surfing Championships Best Waves
programme.desc: The World Dog Surfing Championships Best Waves competition rewards the best waves, champion dog surfers have surfed over the past year.

programme.title: 2025 Corgi Races at Emerald Downs
programme.desc: Get ready for the cutest and most unpredictable event of the year as over 100 Corgis race for the Championship trophy!

programme.desc: From Bank of America Stadium in Charlotte, N.C.
